tweet: Impeachment is a grave & solemn matter. It's a stress test for our democracy. I hope every Senator is prepared to seriously consider & vote honestly with an open mind for the future of our democracy. (3/3)

As the only member of Congress who has participated as part of the Judiciary Committees for all three modern impeachment proceedings, I must be clear that this is not something I sought or relish. (2/3)

It is with honor & determination that I accept this responsibility to fulfill my oath of office to hold the president accountable as an impeachment manager alongside @RepAdamSchiff, @RepSylviaGarcia, @RepValDemings, @RepJeffries, @RepJerryNadler &
@RepJasonCrow. (1/3)

It's official 👇
@HouseJudiciary is starting an investigation into the Trump Admin’s "Remain in Mexico" policy, which threatens the health & safety of legitimate asylum seekers, including women, children, & families. http://bit.ly/35Sq1Y3

I’m fighting for people living with pre-existing conditions in CA-19 & all around the country.

If the GOP’s Texas v US lawsuit strikes down the Affordable Care Act, millions of Americans will lose vital protections & access to care.

We must #ProtectOurCare! pic.twitter.com/UqN3EoJT6S

260 people from Santa Clara County sent me letters of support for the PFAS Action Act, which I co-sponsored.

It requires the @EPA to:
🚫Stem the flow of PFAS contamination into the enviro
🔬Identify health risk associated with PFAS
🚱Limit human exposure to PFAS

Every day, millions of Americans are exposed to unsafe levels of PFAS in their drinking water.

Today, I voted to prevent the spread of these forever chemicals.

Next, the Senate should join us in protecting public health.

Since Congress has not authorized military force against Iran, my vote for @RepSlotkin's War Powers Resolution was an easy one that follows our Constitution.
 
We cannot have high-risk provocations of war without Congressional debate.

“My kids shouldn’t experience such things,” Ms. Hekmati said. “They are US citizens. This is not OK.”

She is 100% correct. This is not OK at all, & I'm working w/@RepJayapal @HouseJudiciary @OversightDems & @HomelandDems to demand answers for families. https://nyti.ms/39N3Wxg

Thanks to everyone who took the time to reach out last year! I’m honored to work for engaged citizens who care about the direction of our country.

In 2020, I plan to continue fighting #ForThePeople of Santa Clara County & listening to your views.

On a policy basis, there is reason to be concerned that this precipitous action may result in an unwanted new war that drags America into further military hostilities. 3/3

When responding to an attack or an imminent threat, the President may act, but must consult w/bipartisan Congressional leaders. Shockingly, Pres. Trump consulted only w/Republican Congressional leaders, an ominous departure that has chilling implications for our democracy. 2/3

The War Powers Act & our Constitution require that approval from Congress be obtained before starting an attack & a war.
